headline: MYSTIC RIVER SOLAR CELL PROBE STATION
specstable:
Manufacturer Mystic River
Model Station 1.0
Other Information

Specifications:
Illuminated Area: 200 X 200mm
Shaded Area: 400mm sq
Minimum Upper Probe Bar Spacing: 9mm,Suitable for use On Multi-Wire Cells
Voltage Probe Points: 5Independent Points Per Probe Bar, 20mm Pitch
Current Ptobe Points: 20 Common Points Per Probe Bar, 10mm Pitch
Manual Clamping System: Clamp System Designer to Overcome Multi-Wire Probe Spring Load
Adjustable Limit Stop: Intermediate Stop Adjustable Between 0 And 75% of Max Pogo Spring Compression
Fixed Hard Stop: Ridgid Stop Prevents Damage to Cells or Probe Frame
Connections: 4mm Banana Jacks
Probe Boards Are Equipped with IDI SS-50-A-2.9-G Pogo Pins

Vacuum Chuck System
Temperature: +5 to +50 Deg. C
Temperature Stability: 0.5 Deg. C
Cooling Capacity at 0 Deg. C: 120 Watts
Heating Capacity: 800 Watts
System Requires a Chiller not included


Exterior Dimensions
Width 15.500 in (39.4 cm)
Depth 20.000 in (50.8 cm)
Height 15.000 in (38.1 cm)
Weight 51 lb (23 kg)
